title: Device ios schema
description: This is a schema that contains information about the customer's IOS operation system data (os version, device name, device token)

version.title: Version
version.description: Describes what version of IOS os customer is using

serialNumber.title: Serial number
serialNumber.description: The serial number of the customer`s device

authToken.title: Authentication token
authToken.description: Allows the server to recognize the customer

pushToken.title: Push token
pushToken.description: Allows to send push notifications to the customer
